title: Classic Yacht Restoration
description: Full restoration of a 1960s classic sailing yacht including hull work, rigging, and interior refurbishment.
longDescription: A complete restoration project of a beautiful 1960s classic sailing yacht. This project required extensive hull work, complete rigging replacement, and a full interior refurbishment while maintaining the vessel's original character and charm.

testimonial.text: The restoration work was exceptional. Ben brought this classic yacht back to life while respecting its heritage.
testimonial.author: Captain Robert Hayes
